results.content: Questo corso ha delle spiegazioni veramente pessime. Il docente, soprattutto per la parte dei serviceworker, assume che i corsisti abbiamo già delle conoscenze approfondite in merito. Alla fine c'è una beffa finale, i sorgenti del corso indicati nel link dell'ultima pagina non corrispondono a quelli fatti nei video. Pessimo corso, non compratelo.

results.content: Very clear, exactly what I was looking for, it's a good introduction to learn how PWA + react are working together. Thanks
results.content_html: Very clear, exactly what I was looking for, it's a good introduction to learn how PWA + react are working together. Thanks

results.content: Nice course outline and easy to follow along! I did noticed some english errors on the presentations and some amateur voice recording (you can ear cars and someetimes people talking during the course). Overall good. Not excellent due to the recording issues
results.content_html: Nice course outline and easy to follow along! I did noticed some english errors on the presentations and some amateur voice recording (you can ear cars and someetimes people talking during the course). Overall good. Not excellent due to the recording issues

results.content: This course gives you a great high to mid level understanding on how Progressive Web Apps work under the hood it's also very beginner friendly. The teaching style is  asy to follow. There are however issues with the sound volume and clarity between certain videos that is something to keep in mind and also point of improvement for the tutor. But that didn't really bother me so i'm not lowering the rating because of it.  After the course I understand now how to create a basic service worker to make any web app into a PWA. Also he promised to update the course which adds alot of value in my opinion.
results.content_html: This course gives you a great high to mid level understanding on how Progressive Web Apps work under the hood it's also very beginner friendly. The teaching style is asy to follow. There are however issues with the sound volume and clarity between certain videos that is something to keep in mind and also point of improvement for the tutor. But that didn't really bother me so i'm not lowering the rating because of it. After the course I understand now how to create a basic service worker to make any web app into a PWA. Also he promised to update the course which adds alot of value in my opinion.

results.content:
Bon cours, bien complet mais avec deux bémols:
1. La qualité audio piètre des enregistrements
2. Le cours se base sur des composants (cf react-router) qui étaient en Alfa et qui aujourd'hui n'existent plus, il a fallu donc modifier certaines parties.

Cependant l'argument est très bien expliqué dans toutes ses parties
results.content_html:

results.content: Content and explanations are good. There are some volume spikes and terrible edition cuts. Pronunciation is not good either, but still understandable.

response.content: Thanks for the response. I will be working on the volume issue and editing in the upcoming videos.
response.content_html: Thanks for the response. I will be working on the volume issue and editing in the upcoming videos.

results.content_html: Content and explanations are good. There are some volume spikes and terrible edition cuts. Pronunciation is not good either, but still understandable.

results.content: Waste of money, content is not up to the mark. The instructor is just writing the codes without properly explaining it, like he just have to write it to make a certain things happen. Even he didn't explained why we should use the custom service worker that he has written, why not use the default service worker that comes bundled with create-react-app. Even he didn't used or talked about code splitting which is an important feature of a PWA. There is no major takeaway from this course for me except the part of online and offline toast and saving some data to localStorage for offline use. I would not recommend this course to others, rather you can find some good written materials on this topic in Medium.

response.content: Thanks for the feedback!  Note that the course is not yet over, Push Notifications, Browser Sync are on the way!
response.content_html: Thanks for the feedback! Note that the course is not yet over, Push Notifications, Browser Sync are on the way!

results.content: Lectures are very easy to follow. The instructor gives a great explanation of what all the services are doing and how they work with each other. The only downside is that in some of the videos the volume goes very low and is a little difficult to hear, but you can usually turn your computer volume up to make it a little more audible. Otherwise, great tutorial.
